description: The ICQ messaging app is shutting down on June 26th, marking the end of a much-beloved communication application. [...]
title: ICQ messenger shuts down after almost 28 years

description: ​​A hacker has defaced the website of the pcTattletale spyware application, found on the booking systems of several Wyndham hotels in the United States, and leaked over a dozen archives containing database and source code data. [...]
title: Hacker defaces spyware app’s site, dumps database and source code

description: Microsoft says the Cortana, Tips, and WordPad applications will be automatically removed on systems upgraded to the upcoming Windows 11 24H2 release. [...]
title: Microsoft: Windows 24H2 will remove Cortana and WordPad apps

description: Some of the largest drug companies in the world have disclosed data breaches due to a February 2024 cyberattack at Cencora, whom they partner with for pharmaceutical and business services. [...]
title: Cencora data breach exposes US patient info from 8 drug companies

description: A new ransomware strain called ShrinkLocker creates a new boot partition to encrypt corporate systems using Windows BitLocker. [...]
title: New ShrinkLocker ransomware uses BitLocker to encrypt your files

description: Google has released a new emergency security update to address the eighth zero-day vulnerability in Chrome browser confirmed to be actively exploited in the wild. [...]
title: Google fixes eighth actively exploited Chrome zero-day this year

description: Microsoft has released an emergency out-of-band (OOB) update for Windows Server 2019 that fixes a bug causing 0x800f0982 errors when attempting to install the May 2024 Patch Tuesday security updates. [...]
title: Microsoft pushes emergency fix for Windows Server 2019 update errors
